articles.title: Fact-checking Trump’s promise to give Americans $2,000 payments from tariff dividends - PBS
articles.description: Over the weekend, President Donald Trump promised Americans $2,000 each from the "trillions of dollars" in tariff revenue he said his administration has collected.
articles.content:
This article originally appeared on PolitiFact.

articles.title: Flight disruptions will persist even after shutdown ends, airlines warn - The Washington Post
articles.description: The House is set to take up a bill to reopen the government after it passed the Senate. Airlines for America said flight schedules cannot “bounce back” immediately.
articles.content: Flight cuts ordered by the Trump administration entered their fifth day Tuesday, as airlines warned it would take time for travel schedules to resume to normalcy even after an agreement to reopen the… [+19 chars]

articles.title: Canada loses measles elimination status after ongoing outbreaks - AP News
articles.description: International health experts say Canada is no longer measles-free because of ongoing outbreaks, as childhood vaccination rates fall and the highly contagious virus spreads across North and South America. The loss of the country’s measles elimination status co…
